perturbation.original_text: 1.5 "Co-Branded Service" means the service to be developed under this Agreement, including Enhancements, which will be offered to Dassault Systemes Customers via the Dassault Systemes Web site(s) and will contain translation and healing application services substantially similar to those currently offered and sold on the PlanetCAD Web site(s) as of the Effective Date under the product name 3Dshare.com, and based upon the CBD Software.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.5 "Co-Branded Service" means the service to be developed under this Agreement, including Enhancements, which will be offered to Dassault Systemes Customers via the Dassault Systemes Web site(s).
perturbation.explanation: The definition of the 'Co-Branded Service' is changed. The clause that specifies that the service will contain translation and healing application services substantially similar to those currently offered and sold on the PlanetCAD Web site(s) as of the Effective Date under the product name 3Dshare.com, and based upon the CBD Software is removed. This is an issue because later in the contract in Section 7, PlanetCad is prohibited from offering competitive services, but without this clause, the scope of the 'Co-Branded service' is unclear. This omission could create enforcement issues, and may be grounds to sue PlanetCAD for unfair competition.

perturbation.original_text:
5.4 Share of Net Revenue. As financial consideration under this Agreement, Net Revenue will be shared by the parties as follows:

(a)   For so long as PlanetCAD hosts the Co-Branded Service,                         during which time PlanetCAD shall be the Billing Party,                         all Net Revenue derived from sales of the Co-Branded                         Service to Dassault Systemes Customers shall be                         apportioned [***] percent ([***]%) to Dassault Systems                         and [***] percent ([***]%) to PlanetCAD.

(b)   In the event that Dassault Systemes opts to host the                         Co-Branded Service pursuant to Section 4.7  [Change of Hosting] herein they                         shall become the Billing Party and all Net Revenue                         derived from sales of the Co-Branded Service shall be                         apportioned [***] percent ([***]%) to Dassault Systems                         and [***] percent ([***]%) to PlanetCAD.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.4 Share of Net Revenue. As financial consideration under this Agreement, Net Revenue will be shared by the parties as follows:

(a)   For so long as PlanetCAD hosts the Co-Branded Service,                         during which time PlanetCAD shall be the Billing Party,                         all Net Revenue derived from sales of the Co-Branded                         Service to Dassault Systemes Customers shall be                         apportioned according to a future agreement.

(b)   In the event that Dassault Systemes opts to host the                         Co-Branded Service pursuant to Section 4.7  [Change of Hosting] herein they                         shall become the Billing Party and all Net Revenue                         derived from sales of the Co-Branded Service shall be                         apportioned according to a future agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The percentage values have been replaced, and the text updated so revenue will be apportioned in the future. This change directly contradicts the purpose of having set percentages. The contract references revenue sharing, but the key term of how revenue is shared is undefined and incomplete. This creates uncertainty and potential disputes over financial compensation.

perturbation.original_text: 4.6 Software Support and Maintenance Obligations of the Parties. For the Term of this Agreement the parties shall cooperate to perform maintenance and support services on their respective software included on and necessary to the operation of the Co-Branded Service. The description of maintenance and support obligations is set forth in the Maintenance and Support Services Schedule, attached hereto as Schedule B and incorporated herein by reference.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.6 Software Support and Maintenance Obligations of the Parties. For the Term of this Agreement the parties shall cooperate to perform maintenance and support services on their respective software included on and necessary to the operation of the Co-Branded Service.
perturbation.explanation: The contract refers to Schedule B outlining the maintenance and support obligations. By removing the reference to Schedule B, the specific obligations are no longer detailed, leading to ambiguity and potential disputes regarding the level and scope of required support.
